title: The Birth Pangs of the Messiah
itunes:title: The Birth Pangs of the Messiah
description: Our readings for today are apocalyptic, which means that they describe the end of an old world and the beginning of a new one. The new world in question is the world of Christ's lordship. To enter into that spiritual space, we have to go through earthquake, famine, and war. But this is, finally good news!
